title_en: Some long-term body parts are classified as “recording structures” if they have three properties:
title_es: Algunas partes del cuerpo duraderas se clasifican como “estructuras de registro” si tienen tres propiedades:
title_zh: 如果一些長期存在的身體部位具備以下三大特點，則定義為「記錄性結構」：
title_tl: Ang ilang pangmatagalang bahagi ng katawan ay inuuri bilang “recording structure” kung taglay nila ang tatlong katangian:
